Class JavaEditArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • alice.tuprologx.ide.JavaEditArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileEditArea, TheoryEditArea, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JavaEditArea
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements TheoryEditArea, FileEditArea
    An edit area for the Java 2 platform. Makes use of an advanced Swing text area.
    Version:
    1.0 - 14-nov-02
    Author:
    Giulio Piancastelli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int caretLine
      The line number corresponding to the caret's current position in the text area.
      private boolean dirty
      Indicate if the edit area is changed after the last Set Theory operation issued by the editor.
      private JEditTextArea inputTheory
      The advanced Swing text area used by this edit area.
      private java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport propertyChangeSupport
      Used for components interested in changes of console's properties.
      private boolean saved
      Indicate if the edit area is changed after the last save operation
      private javax.swing.undo.UndoManager undoManager
      Undo Manager for the Document in the JEditTextArea.

      • setKeyBindings

        private void setKeyBindings(PrologTextArea textArea)
        Set key bindings for edit area actions. Note that the key bindings must be added to the inputHandler in the PrologTextArea through the facilities offered by this component from the jEdit package.
